name: Ball Breaker Pop - Free
description:
This is a free, Ad supported, version of Ball Breaker Pop. This version contains one mode of play. All modes of play are available via an in-app purchase.

How to Play

- The aim of Ball Breaker Pop is simply to pop balls to score points.
- Tap on a ball to highlight the ball or chain of like coloured balls. Tap on the highlighted ball or chain to pop them.
- When a ball or chain of balls is highlighted, tap another ball or outside of the chain to cancel your selection.
- On popping a chain, the more balls that you have chained together the higher the points rewarded.
- The points value of the currently selected chain is shown by the ‘Chain’ score.
- Look out for balls containing bronze, silver and gold starts. They will double, triple and quadruple your chain score respectively. Chain multiplier balls together for more points.
- You have 50 pops to score as many points as possible. Happy popping!

Features

- Universal app compatible with iPad, iPhone and iPod touch
- Retina display optimised
- Game Center achievements and top scores leaderboard supported
- Facebook and Twitter functionality supported
